title: Condemn Channel 4 TV’s anti-Sri Lanka campaign as biased and a disgrace to British media
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Over 2000 British Sri Lankans of different ethnicities and political hues met in London in Sunday evening to stage a massive demonstration against the Channel 4 TV, which at present is going around the world with a “documentary”, named “Sri Lanka’s Killing Fields”….
